html:
5.23.20  3:27 pm   how can I get better at drawing?

      the best way i can think of, is by just doing it more

5.23.20  3:19 pm   What is your favorite technological innovation?

      the alphabet

5.23.20  2:46 pm   Have you ever thought about how you can never stand backwards on stairs? 

      try an escalator

5.23.20  2:35 pm   5.22.20  7:29 pm Oh, I meant, what helps you *to* memorize digits of pi? Do you break the numbers into chunks, or use a mnemonic device, or something else?

      i have no idea. i was very young. i think i first learned up to 50288, and then gradually added more whenever i found out that one of my rivals could do it further than me, and eventually, (apparently, according to what's lodged in my brain) i got up to 9230, and then never went further than that

5.23.20  1:09 pm   I have a character in my head how should it come to life?
[] draw (anatomy study)
[] poem
I can't do music and I am not really experienced in drawing and writing, should I do both? maybe writing in a different language helps

      how about acting out the voice

5.23.20  1:03 pm   What is the hardest part of being faster than the speed of light?

      overcoming the skepticism from society

5.23.20  12:09 pm   why are so many people asking you questions about cereal and hot dogs 

      they are just doing what comes naturally to them

5.23.20  11:33 am   Did your latest song "might quit" mean you were going to quit writing songs?

      not even close

5.23.20  11:25 am   how's the journey to the south pole?

      it was marked with sadness, and regret

5.23.20  10:17 am   how long do you usually take to make a song? (the music only)

      can usually do it in about a week, or less

5.23.20  8:56 am   Thoughts on Abe Lincoln?

      brought the usa to international fame

5.23.20  7:54 am   are you ushering in a new era?

      funny you should mention that

5.23.20  6:14 am   What's your favorite video you've made so far?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.23.20  5:55 am   Recently, I've been trying to get into music production, but I don't really know what to do to get started. I've got all the hardware/software I would need to work well, but I just don't have a clue on how to use them to make something that sounds good to me. Any tips?

      have you written anything

5.23.20  5:52 am   What is your favourite flavour of ketchup?

      the green limited edition shrek themed ketchup, now extremely rare

5.23.20  5:38 am   How's the graphics department doing?

      learning to walk

5.23.20  5:30 am   What is your opinion on ice cream and bacon

      2 rivals, with potentially a secret back door alliance

5.23.20  4:04 am   Other than entertaining yourself and us, does answering these questions as a part of your daily routine serve any purpose/benefits?

      keeps me informed about what's going on in the world

5.23.20  3:57 am   Do you have a macro for writing "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes"?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

5.23.20  3:46 am   You're really inspiring in a lot of ways. Any suggestions for people such as myself who are trying to get into music production more?

     first just try to produce some music. then let me know what your first obstacle is

      Asking for a friend. That friend is me. Love your content!

5.23.20  3:35 am   How do I dismantle society?

      come up with another one of those illusions where a thing might be 2 different things

5.23.20  3:10 am   What is your favorite tetris piece?

      ....

5.23.20  2:38 am   My pressing question is if you, Bill Wurtz, have the capability to predict the future? The reason I am making this strange claim is because on September 18th, 2018 in a video titled Mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up, you recalled that the Dow Jones had gone down to zero. Now your videos are extremely philosophical, so at what point had you imagined a time that the Dow Jones went down to zero?

      the time known as 'the end of the world'

5.23.20  2:09 am   What's funnier than 24?

      getting hopelessly lost trying to remember whether to multiply 4 or 3 times 6 or 8

5.23.20  2:05 am   opinions on trombones?

      a good weapon, for both offense and defense

5.23.20  1:51 am   if wfaoie is series and you mentioned that your current project is semi-related to that,

     i did not mention that

      will vELcRo be in your next video as promised? :D

      i never promised that

5.23.20  1:21 am   what is the best pizza

      dressed pizza

5.23.20  12:58 am   What shape id the sky?

      sphere

5.22.20  11:48 pm   i'm an average singer with a great ear, i want to sing on my own and with other people and even write and sing (multi voice parts) songs, but my voice is plain and never does exactly what i want it to. And i've been working on it for years so i don't think it will get any better in range, control or being engaging to listeners. any ideas?

      start improvising the lyrics

5.22.20  11:44 pm   What is your take on fame

      it's like an ongoing psychological evaluation, where anyone can judge

5.22.20  11:41 pm   Who the best Nintendo character 

      michael jordan

5.22.20  11:21 pm   what is bread

      some kind of a ruse

5.22.20  11:10 pm   hi Billiam. how does one get over stage fright? thanks

      spend more time on stage

5.22.20  10:34 pm   how can i have fun?

      you could try proving that something is something else

5.22.20  10:05 pm   Where are some places you've traveled to

      the store,

5.22.20  9:56 pm   How long is the right amount of time to heat porridge?

      it doesn't matter as long as you don't forget the water. if you forget the water, every time is the wrong time

5.22.20  9:46 pm   how does one learn how to shapeshift, or otherwise become hypermalleable?

      usually what happens is you will do it once by accident. and then things will never be the same again

5.22.20  9:37 pm   What is the most beautiful type of bread 

      bun

5.22.20  9:19 pm   you have been such a big inspiration to me in the past few years. i truly feel that i have grown so much as an artist thanks to your wise insights on creating, and i cannot thank you enough. you never fail to amaze me with your brilliance

     holy converging geometric series you are very friendly

5.22.20  9:04 pm   Are you a time traveler?

      as far as i know, time is the only way to travel

5.22.20  8:37 pm   What are your thoughts on nighttime?

      it goes by so fast

5.22.20  8:29 pm   Do you need to learn music theory to make good music?

      other way around

5.22.20  8:09 pm   can you time travel

      as far as i know, that's actually the only way to travel

5.22.20  8:07 pm   thoughts on the mercator projection.

      the lattitudes are right, but it causes the poles to get huge

5.22.20  7:29 pm   What helps you in memorizing digits of pi?

     could have been friendly childhood rivalry. nowadays it actually doesn't help. in practical reality, if you need to approximate pi, 6 digits is probably more than enough. but my problem is i don't know when to stop myself

      And, on a slightly related note, have you noticed any sort of pattern?

      no

5.22.20  6:56 pm   how many videos are you planning to upload? 

      somewhere around 1000 to 10,000

5.22.20  6:04 pm   favorite fruit??

      []impossible fruit[]

5.22.20  5:22 pm   Do you like sports 

      what the heck is a sport

5.22.20  5:14 pm   can i name my frog einstein

      sure, it might even return the favor and name you einstein as well

5.22.20  4:56 pm   Did you do a bad thing?

     no way

     Do you regret it?
